display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=3% oxygen desaturation
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 3% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oarbp3 + oarop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 ) / slpprdp
